data.comment: Today's referee, Andre Marriner, has blown to start the match.
West Ham drive upfield and Jarrod Bowen gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Man Utd defender.
In the minute 2, West Ham pushes forward through Pablo Fornals, whose finish on goal is saved.
Jarrod Bowen for West Ham gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Man Utd goal kick.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for West Ham at London Stadium.
Free kick for West Ham in their own half.
Andre Marriner signals a Man Utd throw-in in West Ham's half.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for West Ham in their own half.
Man Utd needs to be cautious. West Ham have an attacking throw-in.
West Ham's Jarrod Bowen is whistled for offside at London Stadium.
In the minute 11, West Ham to take a throw-in in Man Utd territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for West Ham in the half of Man Utd.
In the minute 11, Andre Marriner awards Man Utd a goal kick.
In London West Ham's Sebastian Haller is caught offside.
Can West Ham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man Utd's half?
In the minute 13, Ball safe as Man Utd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Man Utd in the half of West Ham.
Andre Marriner awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 15, West Ham to take a throw-in in Man Utd territory.
Man Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Andre Marriner signals a free kick to Man Utd in their own half.
In the minute 18, Man Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
In London, Anthony Martial of Man Utd is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Man Utd.
In the minute 19, Throw-in West Ham.
Throw-in high up the field for West Ham in London.
Man Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 24, Man Utd have been awarded a corner by Andre Marriner.
Free kick Man Utd.
Free kick for West Ham in their own half.
In the minute 28, Man Utd's Edinson Cavani has run offside.
Throw-in for Man Utd in their own half.
West Ham have been awarded a corner by Andre Marriner.
In the minute 32, West Ham attack but Pablo Fornals's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Man Utd at London Stadium.
West Ham are coming forward and Jarrod Bowen gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 33, Man Utd have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Man Utd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 35, Pablo Fornals hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for West Ham!
Andre Marriner signals a free kick to Man Utd in their own half.
Man Utd drives forward and Paul Pogba gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 37, Throw-in West Ham.
Jarrod Bowen (West Ham) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to West Ham.
In the minute 38, West Ham take a 1-0 lead thanks to Tomas Soucek.
Great play from Declan Rice to set up the goal.
Andre Marriner signals a free kick to West Ham.
In the minute 42, Fabian Balbuena (West Ham) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
West Ham have been awarded a corner by Andre Marriner.
In London Man Utd drive forward through Anthony Martial. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to Man Utd.
Can West Ham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man Utd's half?
Jarrod Bowen for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
West Ham's Sebastian Haller misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Man Utd drive forward but Anthony Martial is judged offside.
In the minute 46, The away team replace Edinson Cavani with Marcus Rashford.
Bruno Fernandes is replacing Donny van de Beek for the away team.
In the minute 47, Pablo Fornals for West Ham is whistled offside.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for West Ham in their own half.
In the minute 51, Andre Marriner awards Man Utd a goal kick.
West Ham are pushing forward but Jarrod Bowen's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Man Utd at London Stadium.
In the minute 52, Man Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Harry Maguire of Man Utd smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Man Utd's Mason Greenwood gets in a shot but it is blocked by a West Ham defender.
In the minute 55, Scott McTominay of Man Utd gets in a strike, but is off target.
West Ham have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Man Utd goal kick.
In the minute 57, Andre Marriner blows against Man Utd's Anthony Martial for offside.
Andre Marriner signals a Man Utd throw-in in West Ham's half.
Man Utd push forward at London Stadium and Marcus Rashford gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined West Ham defence.
In the minute 60, Man Utd have been awarded a corner by Andre Marriner.
Throw-in for Man Utd in the half of West Ham.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for West Ham at London Stadium.
In the minute 62, Juan Mata is on a sub for Anthony Martial for Man Utd.
West Ham to take a throw-in in Man Utd territory.
In the minute 63, Can Man Utd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Ham's half?
Goal! Paul Pogba equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
Bruno Fernandes with an assist there.
In the minute 68, Andre Marriner signals a throw-in for Man Utd, close to West Ham's area.
Goal! Mason Greenwood gives Man Utd a 1-2 lead.
Alex Telles instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 70, Man Utd's Marcus Rashford misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Free kick West Ham.
In the minute 71, Andre Marriner signals a free kick to Man Utd in their own half.
Marcus Rashford (Man Utd) fires in a shot – and hits the post!
Andre Marriner awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 73, West Ham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Marcus Rashford for Man Utd who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Marcus Rashford is back on his feet again.
West Ham make their first substitution with Said Benrahma replacing Pablo Fornals.
In the minute 76, Manuel Lanzini is on a sub for Jarrod Bowen for West Ham.
Man Utd's Mason Greenwood breaks free at London Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 77, Andre Marriner awards West Ham a goal kick.
Great finish from Marcus Rashford to give Man Utd a 1-3 lead.
That's a fine assist from Juan Mata.
In the minute 80, Corner awarded to West Ham.
In London West Ham attack through Said Benrahma. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Man Utd at London Stadium.
In the minute 81, Man Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Man Utd's Mason Greenwood gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Andre Marriner awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 83, Free kick for West Ham in the half of Man Utd.
West Ham's Aaron Cresswell is on target but unsuccessful.
West Ham make their third substitution with Ben Johnson replacing Vladimir Coufal.
In the minute 85, West Ham have been awarded a corner by Andre Marriner.
West Ham's Manuel Lanzini is on target but unsuccessful.
Ball goes out of play for a West Ham goal kick.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Man Utd in the half of West Ham.
Andre Marriner signals a Man Utd throw-in in West Ham's half.
West Ham pushes forward through Declan Rice, whose finish on goal is saved.
Andre Marriner signals a free kick to West Ham.
At London Stadium the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Man Utd are pushing forward but Mason Greenwood's finish is wide of the goal.
West Ham have a goal kick.
Said Benrahma of West Ham smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Ball safe as Man Utd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The match has come to a close in London. The final score is 1-3.
